EmailTemplate.name: Notify Resource Manager About New Candidate
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Peritus : Upcoming Employee Onboarding
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Resource_Manager__c},
The following candidate will join our company on {!Contact.EMS_EM_JD__c}:
Name: {!Contact.Name}
Designation: {!Contact.Resource_Role__c}
Please be prepared to give an orientation session on their first day. Also, ensure that training materials/sessions are organized for the employee for the first week, so that the employee has all the necessary information to perform well in their new position.
Regards,
Team Cloud Peritus
